verses.verse: When Yahweh <WH3068> brought back <WH7725> those who returned <WH7725> to Zion, <WH6726> we were like those who dream. <WH2492>

Then our mouth <WH6310> was filled <WH4390> with laughter, <WH7814> and our tongue <WH3956> with singing. <WH7440> Then they said <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> "Yahweh <WH3068> has done <WH6213> great things for them. <WH1431>"
Yahweh <WH3068> has done <WH6213> great things <WH1431> for us, <WH8056> and we are glad.
Restore our fortunes <WH7622> again, <WH7725> Yahweh, <WH3068> like the streams <WH650> in the Negev. <WH5045>
Those who sow <WH2232> in tears <WH1832> will reap <WH7114> in joy. <WH7440>

He who goes <WH3212> out <WH1980> weeping, <WH1058> carrying <WH5375> seed <WH2233> for sowing, <WH4901> will certainly <WH935> come <WH935> again with joy, <WH7440> carrying <WH5375> his sheaves. <WH485>
